# acceleration

**Instance Property**

The acceleration measured by the accelerometer.

## Declaration

```swift
var acceleration: CMAcceleration { get }
```

## Discussion

The description of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMAcceleration] structure type describes the fields used for measuring acceleration.

## Accessing Accelerometer Data

- **CMAcceleration**: The type of a structure containing 3-axis acceleration values.
